My new Climate Risk Disclosure Act would force public companies to disclose critical information about how climate change could affect the value of their assets so that investors can make smart decisions with their money.
Dr. Christine Blasey Ford, we stand with you and your courageous decision to come forward. Republicans in Washington must #PostponeTheVote.

Before the 2008 crash, investors and the government failed to address growing risks in our financial system. We’re making the same mistake with climate change today – we know it’s coming, but we’re not doing enough to stop it. I'm introducing major legislation to help fix that. https://twitter.com/HuffPostPol/status/1040625753325494272 QT @HuffPostPol “This is a critical step toward breaking our addiction to fossil fuels," former Vice President Al Gore said of the legislation. https://m.huffpost.com/us/entry/us_5b9b6381e4b013b097795efb?ncid=tweetlnkushpmg00000016&section=politics
